create.1: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_server (server_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, server_name TEXT, default_channel TEXT);
create.2: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_queries (query_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, search_query TEXT, channel_name TEXT, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, server_query_id INTEGER NOT NULL, filter_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
create.3: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_rotation (rotation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, rotation TEXT, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, server_query_id INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
create.4: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_guesses (user_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, date_guessed TEXT, cooldown_time TEXT);
create.5: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_prompts (query_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, json_prompt TEXT, json_response TEXT, submitted_by TEXT);
create.6: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_queue (storage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, queue_data TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
create.7: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_permissions (permission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, permission_functionality TEXT NOT NULL, permission_value TEXT NOT NULL, role_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
create.8: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_broadcasts (broadcast_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, broadcast_toggle TEXT NOT NULL, broadcast_valid TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
create.9: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS p_fetcher (fetcher_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, server_id TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, channel_link TEXT NOT NULL, latest_video TEXT NOT NULL, latest_vtime TEXT NOT NULL, server_query_id TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(server_id) REFERENCES p_server(server_id));
